info.screen.roleid.avenger:
Start with a protected target.
If the target dies, you become a Vigilante and learn the killer's name.
The revenge target can be Innocent/Neutral/Killer.
info.screen.roleid.conspirator:
Shop has a Death Note to guess others' roles. Correct guesses cause heart failure death.
Shop prices change; can only buy Note, Knife, Gun, Lockpick.
Three wrong guesses will kill you.
info.screen.roleid.slippery_ghost:
Has Slippery Ghost Shop. Passive: +50 coins every 10s.
Exclusive: Blank Cartridge - Right-click target to put their gun on 30s cooldown. Invisible when held.
Exclusive: Smoke Grenade - Right-click to throw, creating smoke. Players inside are blinded. Direct hit clears Sanity (Smoke lasts 10s). Invisible when held.
Item: Lockpick - Same as Killer.
Sabotage: Lights Out - Same as Killer.
info.screen.roleid.bomber:
Has Bomber Shop. Can buy Bombs, Firecrackers, Lockpick.
Exclusive Skill - All the Way Up: Use skill key to buy a bomb (100 coins).
Bought bombs beep after 5s. Right-click on others to pass it!
Bombs are invisible, name only shows when held.
info.screen.roleid.engineer:
Has Engineer Shop. Earn coins from tasks.
Can buy Attendant Key.
Exclusive: Reinforcement - Reinforce doors (blocks crowbar once). Invisible when held.
Exclusive: Alarm Trap - Emits sound when door is crowbarred; reinforced doors lock. Invisible when held.
Exclusive: Lock - When lockpicked, requires manual minigame. 30% chance to break lockpick.
Engineer can Shift+Right-click to remove items from doors.
info.screen.roleid.boxer:
Skill: Steel Body. Press to gain 2.5s invincibility. CD: 2 min.
Can buy Boxing Glove. Hits knock back and stun enemies, and put their items on cooldown.
info.screen.roleid.postman: Shop sells Mail. Exchange an item with someone. Consumed after use.
info.screen.roleid.detective:
Aim at a player and press skill key to inspect their inventory.
Interface closes if player moves. CD: 60s.
Crouch to detect nearby movements.
info.screen.roleid.stalker:
Brief
Use skill on crowds to gain energy. More people = faster charge.
Full energy allows Left-click kill.
After enough kills and energy, lose Left-click kill.
Right-click to charge dash. Dash kills on contact. Returns to previous phase after a while.

Details
Phase 1 [No Shop, only Lockpick] - Team: Killer
1. Infinite sprint, 1 shield layer.
2. Press skill to drain energy until Phase 2.

Phase 2
1. Hunting Dagger: Left-click to kill [CD].
2. Cannot sprint.
Phase 3 Condition: Kill 2 people with dagger, full energy.

Phase 3
1. Lose Dagger Phase 2 attack.
2. Dagger Right-click charge to dash [CD] - Has hitbox behind (careful of teammates).
3. Hit triggers execution countdown:
Each execution reduces time. Returns to Phase 2 when time is 0.
info.screen.roleid.athlete:
Infinite Stamina.
Use skill to gain Speed III. CD: 100s.
info.screen.roleid.admirer:
Use skill to peek at highlighted target for energy.
At 90 energy, become a Manipulator.
info.screen.roleid.trapper:
Use skill on ground to place Calamity Mark (Triggered by others, invisible to them).
Triggering causes loud noise, glow, and marks the player (Rooted for 3s).
Second trigger: 10s. Third: 25s.
info.screen.roleid.star:
Star
Use skill to make players within 30 blocks look at you. Glows for 2s.
Can see how many people are looking at you.
info.screen.roleid.veteran:
Start with a special knife (Killer effect). Disappears after one use. CD: 60s. Killing innocents gives penalty.
Using knife triggers Clown's Psycho Mode but doesn't consume knife.
info.screen.roleid.singer:
Shop sells 4 records.
Right-click record to give buffs to nearby players.
Buffs: Speed I, Restore 15% Sanity, Slowness I, Mining Fatigue V (Good against Killer Psycho Mode).
info.screen.roleid.psychologist:
With 70+ Sanity, use skill on a player. They must stay still. After 10s, fully restores their Sanity.
Mint Candies: Eat to restore 35% Sanity and gain 50 coins. Can drop with Q key.
info.screen.roleid.puppeteer:
Brief
Right-click corpse to collect. Collect enough to advance phase.
Next phase: Press skill to release Puppet. Puppet death returns to body. Puppet is random Killer role.
Body stays put while controlling Puppet.

Details
Phase 1 - Team: Neutral
1. Right-click corpse to remove/collect.
Evolve condition: Collect corpses (Total players / 6). 10s CD.
2. Rendered as Red-Brown gradient in Instinct.

Phase 2
1. Cannot collect corpses.
2. Use skill to create/control Puppet [Charges based on collected corpses].
3. Killer Team Body cannot use shop.
4. Puppet death returns view to body [If body survives].
5. If body dies while controlling, Puppet is removed and player dies.
6. Puppet has random Killer role.
7. Control limit: 1 min. Returns to Phase 2 attack after.
8. Returning resets role to Puppeteer.
9. Puppet and Body inventories are separate.
10. Create Puppet CD.
info.screen.roleid.better_vigilante:
Passive: Last Stand
When only 2 Innocents remain, gain a Derringer and Grenade.
Derringer: Ammo restores only on hit. CD: 2s.
info.screen.roleid.photographer:
You can buy Polaroid camera.
You can blind players in front with flash and make invisible players glow for 3s.
Can take photos to record crime scenes.
Photos drop on death.
Right-click photo paper into camera to load.
Scroll to adjust zoom, Shift for flash/exposure. Right-click to shoot.
Drop photos with Q key.
Photos drop on death.
info.screen.roleid.bartender:
Can see players drinking.
Can see if food/drink is poisoned.
Can see if players are poisoned.
Shop sells Shield Drink (Blocks all damage, except void).
Shielded players have blue border in Bartender's eyes.
info.screen.roleid.coroner:
Can see corpse info (Cause, Time). Can detect fake bodies.
Can detect nearby corpses periodically.
info.screen.roleid.doctor:
Only appears when the Poisoner is on the Killer team.
Start with a one-use Defibrillator (cannot be seen by other players).
Defibrillator: Right-click on a corpse that died within 90s to revive it.
Syringe: Can cure poisoned people. After death, the syringe will be passed to another player on the Innocent team.
Can spend 50 coins to buy an Antidote Reagent, which can check if a target is poisoned.
When the Doctor is alive, players who die within 45 seconds cannot use Killer Instinct and have restricted vision for 45 seconds after death!
info.screen.roleid.noisemaker:
Voice distance greatly increased. Glows on death.
Shop sells Firecrackers.
Skill increases voice range by 4x.
info.screen.roleid.recaller: Use skill to mark a location. Use again to teleport back (100 coins).
info.screen.roleid.voodoo:
Bind a player. If you die (except terrain damage), bound player dies too.
!!! Sheriff killing Voodoo does not trigger penalty.
info.screen.roleid.jester:
Start with Fake Gun and Knife. Being killed by Innocent triggers Psycho Mode (Killer kill doesn't trigger).
Can buy Fake Poison (Triggered by Poisoner's Catalyst).
info.screen.roleid.vulture:
Use skill to eat corpses. Eaten corpses lose info (Coroner sees gibberish).
Eat 1 corpse per 6 players (Min 2).
Eating emits gray particles (Don't do it in public).
Transform into random Killer upon completion.
info.screen.roleid.executioner:
Cannot buy Knife or Psycho Mode. Gun is very cheap.
Gun kills have chance to not drop gun.
Start with locked target (Yellow border). Target death gives 50 coins.
Cannot kill non-targets. Target death switches target.
Note: Grenades only kill target.
info.screen.roleid.morphling:
Use skill to change skin. Duration 35s. CD 20s.
Can buy Hallucination Bottle: Creates mist, blinds nearby, forces perspective change. Invisible when held.
info.screen.roleid.phantom: Use skill to turn invisible. Items held are NOT hidden. Still has collision.
info.screen.roleid.ghost:
Invisible to Killer Instinct (But visible to some Neutrals).
Can see remaining game time.
Use skill to turn invisible. Still has collision.
info.screen.roleid.gambler:
Draw a role every 30s. Use skill to select.
Can pick up Revolver.
Crouch+Shoot self to become selected role.
Death by others: 33% Killer, 33% Sheriff, 33% Death, 1% Solo Win.
info.screen.roleid.attendant:
Has Attendant Key (5 uses, opens dorms).
Has Flashlight (Good for Lights Out).
info.screen.roleid.swapper:
Open inventory to select players and swap their positions.
There is a 1s delay when swapping, during which you cannot move.
Swapped players will be notified.
info.screen.roleid.conductor:
Start with Master Key and Spyglass.
Drops on death.
info.screen.roleid.the_insane_damned_par:
Can hear the dead.
Can disguise as corpse.
Fake corpse detected by Coroner. Not invincible while disguised.
info.screen.roleid.broadcaster:
Start with 200 coins. Spend 100 to Broadcast.
Edit message anytime. Saved until sent.
If you die with saved message, it auto-sends.
Everyone learns of your death.
Can see remaining game time.
info.screen.roleid.manipulator:
You can control the target player for several seconds.
The controlled player cannot control themselves and will move in a random direction.
info.screen.roleid.poisoner:
When you appear on the Killer team, there will be a Doctor on the Innocent team.
See poisoned players. Buy Toxin. Cheaper Poison/Scorpions.
Toxin is ranged (30 blocks). Hit player dies after 10s. One use.
Can buy Catalyst: Right-click to kill all poisoned players immediately (Includes Jester's Fake Poison).
info.screen.roleid.thief: Use skill to steal coins from target.
info.screen.roleid.amnesiac:
See nearby corpses.
Do tasks to maintain Sanity before stealing role.
Right-click corpse to steal role.
Win condition becomes same as stolen role.
info.screen.roleid.arsonist:
Brief
Right-click player with Gas Can to douse.
Douse enough, Lighter cools down. Igniting won't kill self.
Burn everyone to win.

Details
Right-click Gas Can to douse. Right-click Lighter to ignite.
If not enough doused, igniting kills you.
When Lighter CD finishes, igniting is safe.
Arsonist appears Innocent to Instinct.
Note: Items visible to others.
Win if everyone burns.
info.screen.roleid.avaricious:
Start with 50 coins.
Pickpocket nearby players every minute.
Players provide limited coins.
Amount depends on total players.
info.screen.roleid.initiate:
Brief
Do tasks, earn money, buy knife, kill the other Initiate.
Kill other Initiate to become Killer.
If other Initiate dies otherwise, become Amnesiac.

Details
Two Initiates per game, only appears in games with 12+ players. If only one, become Amnesiac after 10s.
Can see other Initiate.
Buy Knife (200 coins) - Only for other Initiate.
Killing others kills you (Failed test).
Innocent team. Cannot pick up gun. No penalty if killed by Innocent.
Success becomes random Killer.
If other dies otherwise, become Amnesiac.
If you die, become Amnesiac (Coroner sees Amnesiac).
If Innocents win and both alive, both win.
After kill, win condition is Killer.
If other dies (not by you), win condition is new role.
info.screen.roleid.necromancer:
Can resurrect dead.
If Killer count < Initial, can resurrect (CD: 3 min).
Resurrected becomes normal Killer.
Cannot buy items, but has Killer Instinct.
Resurrection plays sound and broadcasts.
info.screen.roleid.recorder:
Enabled in games with 10+ players.
Start with Notebook to guess roles.
Records existing roles and player info.
Record role-changing Neutrals ASAP.
Win by guessing 40% of players.
10 wrong guesses kills you.
announcement.goals.awesome_binglus: You have notes and can stick them on players. Mark players as much as possible.
announcement.goals.bartender: See drinking players through walls and protect civilians with Defense Vials!
announcement.goals.better_vigilante: When Civilians + Vigilantes <= 2, gain the powerful Last Stand weapon!
announcement.goals.broadcaster: Broadcast messages to all players. Costs 100 coins.
announcement.goals.conductor: Use the Master Key to open all doors on the train!
announcement.goals.executioner: You can only attack your target. Use your pistol to eliminate them.
announcement.goals.jester: Find the Killer and cooperate with them.
announcement.goals.noisemaker: Reveal your location to all players upon death.
announcement.goals.phantom: Become invisible, but be careful not to bump into others.
announcement.goals.recaller: Teleport to any location on the train!
announcement.goals.gambler: Win by relying on your luck.
announcement.goals.photographer: Photograph as many crimes as possible to discover killers hiding in the crowd!
announcement.goals.the_insane_damned_par: I can hear the voices of the dead.
announcement.goals.trapper: Restrict other players' movement with traps.
announcement.goals.voodoo: Choose a player to die with you.
announcement.goals.vulture: Eat corpses to transform into a Killer.
announcement.goals.sheriff: Complete tasks with your gun to earn coins.
hud.voodoo.tip: Voodoo death must be triggered by another player!
hud.vulture.already_consumed: This corpse has already been consumed.
item.noellesroles.defense_vial.tooltip:
Right-click on a drink tray to use
Removes all poison from the tray
Gives the drinker an extra chance against death.
item.noellesroles.delusion_vial.tooltip:
Right-click on a food/drink tray to use
Creates fake poison; players who consume it
think they are poisoned, but suffer no real effects.
item.noellesroles.boxing_glove.tooltip: Charge 0.4s to attack. Stuns target and seals items for 1.5s
item.noellesroles.catalyst.tooltip: Right-click to kill all poisoned players immediately
item.noellesroles.sheriff_gun_maintenanc:
Right-click to maintain your revolver
Restores durability and resets cooldown
Gain 150 coins after use
message.broadcaster.example_message: Watch out! The killer is nearby!
screen.broadcaster.title: Broadcast Message
insane.tip.over: Press G to end fake death
announcement.goals.illusionist: Use hallucination bottles to disrupt enemies' vision!
game.win.gambler: Gambler wins with a 1% chance, laughing at everyone!
gui.noellesroles.gambler.title: Gambler Role Selection
hud.noellesroles.gambler.revolver_tip: Crouch+Right-click with gun to suicide and change role
screen.noellesroles.gambler.hint: Press ESC to return or cancel
announcement.goals.avenger: Protect your bound target. If they die, you gain vengeful power!
announcement.goals.conspirator: Guess other players' roles. If correct, they die in 20 seconds!
announcement.goals.example_killer: Eliminate all passengers without being discovered.
announcement.goals.slippery_ghost: Use your exclusive shop to disrupt others and win with the Killers!
announcement.goals.telegrapher: Use your ability to send anonymous messages to all players, up to 6 times!
announcement.goals.engineer: Use repair tools and alarm traps to protect passengers from Killer sabotage!
announcement.goals.boxer: Use 'Steel Body' to counter attackers and protect yourself and passengers!
announcement.goals.postman: Use mail to secretly exchange items with players.
announcement.goals.detective: Spend 200 coins to inspect a player's inventory. Closes if target moves!
item.noellesroles.conspiracy_page.toolti: Right-click to use and guess a player's role
item.noellesroles.blank_cartridge.toolti: Right-click on target player to put their held gun on 30s cooldown
item.noellesroles.smoke_grenade.tooltip: Throw to create a smoke cloud causing blindness; direct hit clears target's sanity
item.noellesroles.reinforcement.tooltip: Right-click on door to reinforce (blocks one crowbar); sneak + right-click to unjam and remove items
item.noellesroles.alarm_trap.tooltip: Right-click on door to place; triggers alarm when crowbar is used
item.noellesroles.lock.tooltip: Right-click on door to lock; resists lockpick
item.noellesroles.delivery_box.tooltip: Aim at player and right-click to open secret exchange interface
item.noellesroles.defibrillator.tooltip: Right-click on a corpse that died within 90s to revive it
item.noellesroles.antidote_reagent.toolt: Right-click player to check if poisoned
message.noellesroles.defibrillator.prote: You were defibrillated! If you die in 90s, you revive in 30s.
message.noellesroles.defibrillator.you_r: You revived thanks to the Defibrillator!
message.noellesroles.defibrillator.too_l: This corpse has been dead for too long to revive!
message.noellesroles.defibrillator.playe: Could not find the player associated with this corpse!
message.noellesroles.doctor.penalty: Doctor is alive! You cannot use Killer Instinct or see well for 45s after death!
message.noellesroles.penalty.limit.god_j: Conspirator and Death Whisper Killer are both alive! Killer Instinct and vision restricted!
message.noellesroles.penalty.limit.death: You cannot see their cause of death!
message.noellesroles.avenger.bound: You are protecting %s. If they die, you gain vengeful power!
message.noellesroles.avenger.activated: %s has been killed! Your vengeance awakens!
message.noellesroles.conspirator.correct: You guessed correctly! %s will die in 20 seconds...
message.noellesroles.conspirator.wrong: You guessed wrong! %s is not that role.
message.noellesroles.conspirator.wrong_w: You guessed wrong! %s is not that role. (%s guesses remaining)
message.noellesroles.conspirator.too_man: You guessed wrong too many times! The conspiracy backfires...
message.noellesroles.conspirator.cursed: You feel a mysterious power enveloping you...
message.noellesroles.conspirator.killed: %s has been killed by your conspiracy!
message.noellesroles.conspirator.not_con: Only the Conspirator can use this item!
tip.noellesroles.conspirator.no_target: Use a Conspiracy Book Page to guess a player's role
screen.noellesroles.conspirator.title: Book of Conspiracy
screen.noellesroles.conspirator.hint: Press ESC to go back or cancel
message.noellesroles.slippery_ghost.blan: Target is not holding a gun!
message.noellesroles.slippery_ghost.smok: %s was directly hit by smoke grenade, sanity cleared!
tip.noellesroles.slippery_ghost.shop: Press TAB to open Slippery Ghost Shop
tip.noellesroles.broadcaster.hint: Press G to open Broadcast Editor
screen.noellesroles.broadcaster.title: Broadcast Editor
message.noellesroles.engineer.reinforced: Door reinforced! Can withstand one crowbar attack.
message.noellesroles.engineer.already_br: This door is broken and cannot be reinforced!
message.noellesroles.engineer.not_engine: Only the Engineer can use this item!
message.noellesroles.engineer.trap_trigg: Alarm! Someone is breaking the door lock!
message.noellesroles.engineer.reinforcem: Reinforcement destroyed by crowbar, but the door remains intact
tip.noellesroles.engineer.shop: Press TAB to open Engineer Shop
message.noellesroles.postman.delivery_re: %s wants to exchange items with you
tip.noellesroles.postman.shop: Press TAB to open Postman Shop
hud.noellesroles.detective.ready: Inspection ready! Aim and press G
screen.noellesroles.postman.title: Secret Delivery
screen.noellesroles.postman.hint: Click slots to place items, complete after both confirm
message.noellesroles.boxer.ability_activ: Steel Body activated! Immune to death for 1.5 seconds!
message.noellesroles.boxer.counter_succe: Counter successful! %s was deflected by your Steel Body!
message.noellesroles.boxer.counter_knife: Your knife was deflected! Going on cooldown...
message.noellesroles.boxing_glove.hit_by: You were hit by a Boxing Glove!
announcement.goals.athlete: Use your infinite stamina and sprint ability to help passengers complete tasks!
message.noellesroles.athlete.ability_act: Sprint activated! Speed boosted for 20 seconds!
announcement.goals.stalker: Observe from the shadows, feeding on fear. Evolve to hunt everyone.
message.noellesroles.stalker.immunity_tr: At the last moment, something protected you.
announcement.goals.admirer: Observe your bound target to accumulate energy. Turn into a Manipulator at full energy!
hud.noellesroles.admirer.title: Admirer
message.noellesroles.trapper.no_ground: No ground found to place trap!
message.noellesroles.trapper.trap_trigge: You triggered a trap! Imprisoned for %s seconds!
message.noellesroles.trapper.mark_count: You have been marked %s times, imprisonment extended!
announcement.goals.star: You are in the spotlight! Glow for 2s every 20s. Use ability to make nearby players look at you!
hud.noellesroles.star.title: Star
message.noellesroles.star.attracted: ✨ Your gaze is drawn to the Star!
announcement.goals.veteran: You are a veteran. Start with a knife. It disappears after one kill.
message.noellesroles.veteran.knife_used: Your knife has been used and disappeared!
announcement.goals.singer: You are a singer! Press ability key to play random record music for others to hear!
hud.noellesroles.singer.title: Singer
announcement.goals.psychologist: When your sanity is above 70, aim at a player and keep them still for 10s to fully restore their sanity!
hud.noellesroles.psychologist.title: Psychologist
hud.noellesroles.psychologist.ready: Heal Ready - Aim and Press G
hud.noellesroles.psychologist.not_ready: Your sanity must be >70 to heal others
message.noellesroles.psychologist.not_fu: Your sanity must be above 70 to use this ability!
message.noellesroles.psychologist.healin: Started healing %s. Keep target still for 10 seconds!
message.noellesroles.psychologist.being_: %s is healing your mind. Stay still!
announcement.goals.puppeteer: Collect corpses to evolve. After evolving, use collected corpses to create puppets and control them to hunt!
hud.noellesroles.puppeteer.title: Puppeteer
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.phase2_ad: You've collected enough corpses! You are now a Puppet Master!
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.puppet_ac: Puppet activated! You have %s seconds to hunt!
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.puppet_ti: Puppet time exhausted, returning to body...
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.body_died: Your body was killed! Game over.
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.shop_bloc: Puppet Master cannot use shop in body mode!
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.ability_c: Puppet ability on cooldown, %s seconds remaining
announcement.goals.manipulator: Select a player to manipulate. Your body stays put, but you gain their appearance, inventory, and abilities! Lasts 50s. If your body dies, you die!
hud.noellesroles.manipulator.title: Manipulator
message.noellesroles.manipulator.control: Control time ended, returning to body...
message.noellesroles.manipulator.being_c: You are being controlled by the Manipulator! Cannot act...
message.noellesroles.manipulator.body_di: Your body was killed! Game over.
message.noellesroles.manipulator.target_: %s died while you were controlling them!
game.win.recorder: Recorder successfully recorded 40% of players and won!
announcement.goals.recorder: Use Notebook to guess roles. Guess 40% of players correctly to win solo!
announcement.goals.noellesroles.recorder: Use Notebook to guess roles. Guess 40% of players correctly to win solo!
screen.noellesroles.recorder.title: Recorder's Note
screen.noellesroles.recorder.hint: Press ESC to return or cancel
message.noellesroles.recorder.died_from_: You died from too many mistakes!
message.noellesroles.recorder.win: Recorder %s completed all records and won!
announcement.goals.bomber: Buy bombs and pass them to others. Bomb timer 20s, invisible for first 10s. Passing adds 1.5s.
message.noellesroles.admin.free_cam_hint: Admins can use /nr_free_cam to escape corpse view
announcement.goals.doctor: You will arrive together with the Poisoner, using your medical equipment to protect everyone's safety
announcement.goals.attendant: Use your attendant key and flashlight to help civilians in the dark
screen.noellesroles.guess_role.title: Role Guess Note
announcement.goals.noellesroles.recorder: Use Notebook to guess roles. Guess 40% of players correctly to win solo!
info.screen.roleid.monitor: You can use your skill to mark a player and see their location.
announcement.goals.monitor: Mark a player and see their location.
message.noellesroles.swapper.swapped: You have been swapped by the Swapper!
info.screen.roleid.patroller: When someone dies within 30 blocks of your vision, you gain a revolver and an attendant key.
announcement.goals.patroller: When you witness a murder with your own eyes, you will uphold the final justice of this journey.
info.screen.roleid.glitch_robot:
You have no mood.
Double stamina limit
Immune to poison
Every minute, a glitch occurs (rooted for 2 seconds)
Upon death, leaves a glitch current (players inside get Slowness II)
Shop sells Night Vision Goggles and Glowstone Dust
When wearing Night Vision Goggles, buying Glowstone Dust can recharge the goggles
announcement.goals.glitch_robot: You were abandoned here, find a way out with the good guys!
